text: Jhanjh Lobongo Phool (); is a Bengali television soap opera that premiered on June 20, 2016 and airs on Star Jalsha. Produced by Shree Venkatesh Films, it stars Ishaa Saha and Rajdeep Gupta in lead roles and Swagata Mukherjee, Anuradha Roy, Kaushiki Guha, Biplab Banerjee and Ratna Ghoshal in pivotal roles. It replaced the popular show Bojhena Se Bojhena. The Show Was Get New Time 5:00pm For Low Trp Rateing.. ==Cast== * Ishaa Saha as Lobongo Lata Sen Sharma/ Lobu * Rajdeep Gupta as Neel Sen Sharma * Swagata Mukherjee as Indrani Sen Sharma * Kaushiki Guha as Nayantara, Lobongo's Mother * Ratna Ghoshal as Sarajubala * Manasi Sinha as Sarala * Arpita Mukherjee as Atashi * Sanjib Sarkar as Bhuban, Lobongo's Father * Judhajit Banerjee as Atashi’s Husband * Biplab Banerjee as Abhirup Sen Sharma * Anuradha Roy as Annada Sen Sharma * Sourav Das as Bishu * Alivia Sarkar as Manali * Shraboni Bonik as Poushali Sen Sharma * Satyapariyo Sarkar as Poushali’s Husband * Riyanka Dasgupta as Mehuli * Simran Upadhyay as Radhika * Samriddho as Rohan * Nibedita Chakraborty as Annada’s Sister in law * Chaitali Dasgupta as Indrani's Mother * Arpita Dutta Chowdhury as Kabita * Soma Chakrabarty as Brihospoti * Palash Ganguly as Ankit * Mou Bhattacharya as Rehana's Mother * Prantik Banerjee as Rehana's brother * Sohan Bandopadhyay as Mr Dutta, Manager of Victoria Palace * Pritha Bandopadhyay as Priti * Shreyasee Samanta as Employee of Victoria Palace * Vikramjit Chaudhury as Hotel Chef * Nilanjan Datta as Hotel Chef == References == ==External links== * Category:2013 Indian television series debuts Category:Bengali-language television programming in India
title: Jhanjh Lobongo Phool
